name: L1 Cache Memory
description: High-speed memory cache for crucial operations. Increases critical hit multiplier by 0.35x.

name: Instruction Pipelines
description: Execute multiple instructions simultaneously. Increases critical hit multiplier by 0.7x.

name: Branch Prediction
description: Anticipates execution paths for optimization. Increases critical hit multiplier by 1.4x.

name: Speculative Execution
description: Executes instructions before they're confirmed needed. Increases critical hit multiplier by 3.5x.

name: Predictive Algorithms
description: Uses AI to predict optimal execution paths. Increases critical hit multiplier by 7x.
